description: Delete a time card cost code allocation.
permissions: Admin users; otherwise users who are practical members of the allocation customer (policy destroy).
side_effects: Deletes the allocation if permitted; touches related time_card and job_production_plan; deletion can be blocked if linked project phase cost item actuals exist.
validation_notes: Allocation ID argument is required. --confirm is required. Allocations linked to actuals may not be deletable.

flags.name: --confirm
flags.validation: Must be set to true to delete.
